title: 【unturned3.0控制台指令】翻译版
author: Yihc
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Yihc 于 2015-7-26 11:57 编辑 

命令后有个*的代表必须加入服务器内才能使用
命令后有个^的代表必须在控制台CMD里才能使用



Admin [玩家名/ID]
- 给予XX玩家管理权限


Admins
- 查看所有管理员


Ban [玩家名/ID]/Duration/Reason
- 封禁XX玩家(类似服务器的BAN)


Bans
- 查看被封禁玩家名单


Bind [IP]*
- 给服务器绑定IP


Cycle [数字]
- 设置昼夜时长


Day
- 切换时间到白头


Debug
- 提供服务器状态信息


Experience [玩家名/ID]/经验数值
- 给予XX玩家经验


Give [玩家名/ID]/物品ID/数量
- 给予XX玩家物品


Help
- 提供命令信息


Kick [玩家名/ID]
- 把XX玩家踢出服务器


Loadout [物品ID]/[物品ID]/...
- 当玩家重生的时候给予XX物品


Map [地图名称]*
- 设置服务器地图


Maxplayers [数字]*
- 设置服务器最大人数


Mode [Easy | Normal | Hard | Gold]*
- 设置游戏难度(简单,普通,困难,黄金)


Name [内容]*
- 设置服务器名称


Password [内容]*
- 设置进入服务器的密码(用于上锁的服务器)


Permit [玩家名]/[Tag]
- 给予XX玩家白名单


Permits
- 查看所有白名单玩家


Players
- 查看所有在线玩家


Port [数字]*
- 设置端口号


PvE*
- PVE模式


PvP*
- PVP模式


Save^
- 保存服务器


Say [内容]
- 发布公告信息给玩家


Shutdown^
- 关闭服务器(关闭前请务必保存游戏)


Slay [玩家名/ID]
- 杀死XX玩


Teleport [A玩家/ID]/[B玩家名/ID | Location]
- 把A玩家传送到B玩家


Time [数字]
- 设置当前时间


Timeout [数字]^
- 设置在一定时间内关闭服务器


Unadmin [玩家名/ID]
- 撤销XX玩家的管理员权限


Unban [玩家名/ID]
- 给XX玩家解除封禁


Unpermit [玩家名/ID]
- 给XX玩家解除白名单


Vehicle [玩家名/ID]/[车辆ID]
- 给XX玩家一辆车


Welcome [内容]*
- 当加入服务器时，系统自动说的话







原文：

Admin [SteamID | Player]
- This adds the specified player to the list of users allowed to use admin commands in the chat.

Admins
- This shows a list of the current admins.

Ban [SteamID | Player]/Duration/Reason
- This adds the specified player to the list of users not allowed to join the server.

Bans
- This shows a list of the current bans.

Bind [IP]*
- This binds a specific internal IP to the socket.

Chatrate [Number]
- This assigns a minimum time between chat messages.

Cycle [Number]
- This assigns the length of the day/night cycle in seconds.

Day
- This assigns the current time to day.

Debug
- This provides information on the state of the server.

Experience [SteamID | Player]/Experience
- This gives a player some experience.

Give [SteamID | Player]/[ItemID]/Amount
- This gives a player an item.

Help
- This provides information on commands.

Commands marked with * Must be entered into the server command file dir.
Commands marked with ^ Must be entered into the server CMD.
K-P
Kick [SteamID | Player]
- This disconnects the specified player from the server.

Loadout [ItemID]/[ItemID]/...
- This gives players each item when spawning.

Map*
- This sets the map that the server loads on startup.

Maxplayers [Number]*
- This sets the maximum number of connections the server is willing to accept.

Mode [Easy | Normal | Hard | Gold]*
- This assigns the difficulty of the server. Gold is accessible only to premium players and provides special benefits.

Name [Text]*
- This assigns the name of the server on the server list.

Password [Text]*
- This assigns the codeword required for entry to the server.

Permit [SteamID]/[Tag]
- This adds the specified player to the list of users allowed to join the server.

Permits
- This shows a list of the current players allowed to join the server.

Players
- This shows a list of the current player on the server.

Port [Number]*
- This assigns the port of the server. Port + 1 and port + 2 are also used, so remember to open them on the router as well.

PvE*
- This allows player versus environment combat.

PvP*
- This allows player versus player combat.

Commands marked with * Must be entered into the server command file dir.
Commands marked with ^ Must be entered into the server CMD.
S-W
Save^
- This forces a proper save of the server state.

Say [Text]
- This broadcasts a message to all of the connected clients.

Shutdown^
- This properly saves the server state, disconnects the clients and closes the program.

Slay [SteamID | Player]
- This kills the specified player in-game and permanently bans them.

Teleport [SteamID | Player]/[SteamID | Player | Location]
- This teleports the first player to the second or a location.

Time [Number]
- This assigns the current time in seconds of the day/night cycle.

Timeout [Number]^
- This assigns a maximum ping threshhold to the server before a client is kicked.

Unadmin [SteamID | Player]
- This removes the specified player from the list of users allowed to use admin commands in the chat.

Unban [SteamID | Player]
- This removes the specified player from the list of users not allowed to join the server.

Unpermit [SteamID | Player]
- This removes the specified player from the list of users allowed to join the server.

Vehicle [SteamID | Player]/[VehicleID]
- This gives a player a vehicle.

Welcome [Text]*
- This sets a welcome message shown to clients as they connect.

Commands marked with * Must be entered into the server command file dir.
Commands marked with ^ Must be entered into the server CMD.




如果发现有翻译错误的地方，请纠正。
物品ID和汽车ID,可能下次我会发。

replies.author: Yihc
replies.txt_content:
说一下该怎么用，比如
Experience [玩家名/ID]/经验数值
- 给予XX玩家经验

在游戏里打@experience XXX/数组
比如@Experience Yihc/100
